org.agorava.api.rest

Interface HttpParameters


  • public interface HttpParameters
    Http Parameters manipulation with various String transformation
    Author:
    Antoine Sabot-Durand

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      HttpParameters add(String key, String value)
      Create a param from key value and add it to the list
      HttpParameters addAll(HttpParameters other)
      Merge another HttpParameters in this list
      HttpParameters addMap(Map<String,? extends Object> map)
      Add a map to this param list
      HttpParameters addQuerystring(String queryString)
      Add a Query String in this param list.
      String asFormUrlEncodedString() 
      String asOauthBaseString() 
      String asUrl(String url)
      Append the list to an URL
      int size() 

    • Method Detail

      • add

        HttpParameters add(String key,
                 String value)
        Create a param from key value and add it to the list
        Parameters:
        key - name of the param
        value - value of the param
        Returns:
        this

      • addAll

        HttpParameters addAll(HttpParameters other)
        Merge another HttpParameters in this list
        Parameters:
        other - the HttpParameters to merge
        Returns:
        this

      • addQuerystring

        HttpParameters addQuerystring(String queryString)
        Add a Query String in this param list. Query string will be parsed and it's parameter added here
        Parameters:
        queryString - the string to parse feed this list
        Returns:
        this

      • addMap

        HttpParameters addMap(Map<String,? extends Object> map)
        Add a map to this param list
        Parameters:
        map - the map to add
        Returns:
        this

      • asUrl

        String asUrl(String url)
        Append the list to an URL
        Parameters:
        url - to append
        Returns:
        the appended url

      • asOauthBaseString

        String asOauthBaseString()
        Returns:
        the parameter list converted in OAuth 1.0a base string (the string to sign)
        See Also:
        the oauth spec for more info on this.

      • asFormUrlEncodedString

        String asFormUrlEncodedString()
        Returns:
        the parameter list converted in HTTP form encoded String

      • size

        int size()
        Returns:
        number of parameters
